website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable pillow by a trusted brand that's suitable for all types of sleepers. Memory foam isn't for everyone, but most who try it like it.
pros: Very well made with memory foam that provides unmatched support and all-around comfort
cons: Takes a long time to dry after washing

customer_reviews.title: which is very steady and i loved it. But the other one is very puffy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Eden Pillows from this seller. One came with a darker color fiberfill, which is very steady and i loved it. But the other one is very puffy, which i hated it. I am not sure why the exact same model can come with different fiberfill. maybe one of them is not with the original fiberfill.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Xiang

customer_reviews.title: Pillow not filled with what the item description indicates
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 COOP original pillows and one junior pillow. I thought since I am a side sleeper I would spend the $$ for the COOP Eden. This is 90% poly-fill. You could easily go to a craft store and purchase this filling. Where's the shredded foam gel fill? I can count by hand. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: webbizy

customer_reviews.title: Has better quality foam( appears same one as in body pillow)then ...
customer_reviews.text: Has better quality foam( appears same one as in body pillow)then early models of the pillow and feels softer also they send me new one for warranty due to my early model one having a hole in corner that came apart(premium model one).
customer_reviews.author: Julius S

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable smell
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting smell. The video instructions say there might be a slight smell, but don’t worry as it’s perfectly safe. The smell of cow crap is perfectly safe but I don’t want to put it next to my head. If exposure to sunlight or a dryer makes this smell go away, then the mfg should do that before shipping an $80 pillow.
customer_reviews.author: RoseNgo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have a bad back or neck
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review, but this has disappointed so greatly I just had to warn others. At first I was thrilled with this soft pillow, but after just a month and a half the support it gave at first is completely gone, and I'm having severe upper back and neck issues. Me and my physiotherapist both think it's because of this pillow. Wish it came with more extra filling, since this just falls short (and has cost me much more than just the wasted money).
customer_reviews.author: Eva De Nauw

customer_reviews.title: Good but strong chemical smell - dryer helped
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good but came with a strong chemical odor. It came up vacumn packed and fluffed after running in the dryer for 10 minutes. It also came with extra foam in case someone wanted more fluff and support. I am a side sleeper and in my case I reduced around 10% foam. There was a strong chemical odor when I opened the package. I thought it would go away but it's been two weeks and I can still smell it. Couldn't even use the pillow for first week as the smell gave me a headache. Thought I would give it some time to clear but it has not so far.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: I am going to update this review when I can actually use the most expensive pillow I have ever purchased. The smell is unreal. I had a migraine the day after I used it for one night from the smell. I then have been airing it out my a window for ten days now and it still stinks. When will the smell go away? This was WAY too expensive to not be able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: We have a Casper pillow, buckwheat pillows, memory foam pillows, feather pillows ... After 3 nights, I proclaim this the best of the lot. Incredibly supportive yet soft. Why not 5 starts? Despite the "cooling cover" and "gel enfusion," it's still hot after a few minutes. Not as hot as the Casper, but not nearly as cool as the buckwheat or feathers. Still, I think this will be the pillow for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow at first felt great then I found out it sags and shifts quite a bit with use. I wish I were able to return it! The pillow has given me some serious neck pain and I don’t wake up feeling good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality issue
customer_reviews.text: I got the pillow today and right out of the box, I found a hole... I don't know about other products but this one should've not passed the quality control test...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Moon

customer_reviews.title: First good night's sleep in over a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had moderate neck/shoulder/back issues for more than five years, and my neck pain in particular has become severe over the past year, thanks to bulging discs, arthritis, and bone spurs. After trying at least half a dozen pillows of varying materials and types, I tried Coop's Eden pillow. Without exaggerating, I can say I had my first good night's sleep in over a year, and I awoke with virtually no pain. It's been an incredible relief, both physically and mentally, to feel something close to normal again. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: scody

customer_reviews.title: but for a side sleeper like me, this has been an overnight sensation
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of a pillow, but for a side sleeper like me, this has been an overnight sensation. I woke up really rested after my first night. I love how I can customize it at will. It was a little burrito in a box when it arrived, but it expanded after a few punches and fluffs it was really amazing! The foam doesn't get you too warm, it's very breathable, a slight scent of chemical is noted but it's disappearing with time. So far I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad, doesn’t cool at all
customer_reviews.text: Pillow smells really bad. Followed the instructions to the letter and dried it for 10 mins low heat. Same horrible smell. Second time 15 mins, nothing, third time 15 mins high heat. Nothing. Had to wash it, then dry it for 4 1/2 hours high heat. That got rid of the bad smell, but now pillow lost the cooling feature. After washing the pillow is now extra inflated. I’m thinking of getting some stuffing out, see if it helps, but it’s still a very crappy pillow Do NOT buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Sala

customer_reviews.title: It stinks...literally
customer_reviews.text: well - I was hoping I’d get the one non-chemically laden smelling pillow, but I was wrong. The pillow comes packaged very well - tightly vacuumed sealed for packaging efficiency. However, the SMELL. Is NAUSEATING. It’s not good. I shoved a bunch of dryer sheets in there and opened up the inside pillow liner to allow the gel/foam bits to air out of their gross chemical smell. I’m sure it’s a comfy pillow, just not one I want to put near my face right now.
customer_reviews.author: Etch-a-sketch

customer_reviews.title: Check the filling before keeping
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first pillow in Dec 2018 and it was a life changer. Great shredded memory foam filling. Bought a second one Nov 2019 and it is filled with garbage squishy blend. Took me too long to realize the second one was inferior so we couldn’t return it. Make sure you open your pillow and check the filling before keeping it. Second pillow was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Still excellent support, 2 1/2 years later
customer_reviews.text: I sleep hot, and on my side. I had a neck and back injury when I was 21. Now that I’m approaching 75 arthritis has come to stay. I was using My Pillow, but I was constantly washing it and pushing in the ends to maintain loft. I purchased The Eden pillow for myself in September 2017. I added extra fill after a few nights and the support has been wonderful. This is a good company with a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: VSP

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively Comfortable (at first)
customer_reviews.text: I’m finally able to write a review after sleeping on these for 4 months. I honestly need a chiropractor for the damage this pillow has done to my neck. And for the longest time I didn’t make the connection to my stiffness and tiredness in the mornings to the pillow. The first few nights felt great. I think that’s why I didn’t make the association that my neck and shoulder pains was being driven by the pillow. Last night (after tossing and turning all night) I finally threw the pillow off the bed and EUREKA! Immediately I was able to find comfort and sleep. I will never sleep on that thing again.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLand 23223

customer_reviews.title: A TOXIC SMELL
customer_reviews.text: Received the pillow yesterday. I was very surprised at the putrid, emanating order that the end product produced. Cannot wait to remove it from my house. 75.00 dollars? Are they kidding. And the reviews, are they FAKE?
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for me being a side sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when it came that it was going to be too much oomph. But I followed the enclosed instructions and didn’t remove any stuff I f since I’m a side sleeper. It’s been about a week now and it’s great! I sleep so soundly, and I LOVE that it doesn’t “deflate” while using it. I’ve been a life long pillow flipper, partially for fluff and partially for heat. I don’t have to do this now. I can’t say that the cooling aspect of this pillow feels any cooler to the touch, but it definitely doesn’t get as hot as other pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny D.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to be a 5 star rating, but can only give it 4 stars because after a few months of use the filler has compressed and does not offer as much support as new. Overall this is the best pillow I have found after trying many types. Just a shame about the fill. Company website says it will provide one small bag of replacement filler free. Better customer service would be to ship the extra fill with the order if the company is aware buyers will need it. Again, I like the pillow, but because of the filler compressing, I knocked of 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with these pillows
customer_reviews.text: So i work 5-6 days a week 13-16hr shifts getting off at 330 in the morning. I've been ordering different pillows to find one that helps me sleep better while being comfortable. I've tried Ghost Pillow and some Wonder Sleep pillow as well as these Coop's and i have to say i am beyond happy with these Coop's. I love how adjustable they are and how comfortable they are. It took some time to find the right amount of support but once found, i slept better than i have in months and that means a lot considering i top out at 5hrs a night. Extremely happy with these pillows
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the review I thought it will be a great one. So I went ahead and bought 2. but it started giving me Neck pain after few days. It doesn’t support your neck and feels too hard. My wife complained the same thing as being too stiff. Also I am not sure why they are advertised as Cool gel but it doesn’t give the cooling sensation at all. Kinda disappointed. Don’t know if they have any better one. Gonna return it.
customer_reviews.author: MR - CA

customer_reviews.title: Be patient and do a couple of easy preliminary steps
customer_reviews.text: At first I had an issue with “memory foam” smell. I put in the dryer as suggested by seller, but I could stilll smell a little something. I put it outside in a laundry basket and that did the trick. I also took some stuffing out after reading another review and SAVED IT(just in case). It is MY FAVORITE pillow ever! Not exaggerating!
customer_reviews.author: bkl

customer_reviews.title: Utter trash, provides no support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pillow mainly due to all the 5* reviews saying how much support this pillow gives...but I don't what pillow they're all using. At the beginning of the night, the pillow is puffy & may the most comfortable pillow you ever lie your head on. Then you go to sleep. Then you wake up a couple hours later because the the memory has completely compressed flat offering no support. You fluff the pillow, go back to sleep, wake up in a couple more hours with no support again. My back & neck hurt worse than they did before I bought this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinky.  Not cooling.  Too much support
customer_reviews.text: If you want a lot of support but no comfort; get this pillow. If you want a pillow that smells heavily of chemicals; get this pillow. If you want a pillow that claims to be “cooling” but isn’t.... then get this pillow. Completely overrated and not worth anywhere near $80. I’ll stick with my 10 year-old down pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I am a difficult sleeper but this pillow is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Short story is I purchased a new mattress a few months ago and developed serious should pain on both shoulders. Was about a day or two away from returning the mattress and spending $4000+ on a TempurPedic mattress. Thought I would try a new pillow first. Shoulder pain is quickly going away. You can adjust the pillow height to your needs. Quality build, no odors, very comfy. Last night was my second night on this pillow and truly the best night sleep I have had in months. I am shocked at what a difference the right pillow can make. BTW I ordered the pillow on Sunday and it arrived on Monday! VERY pleased and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. It's very comfortable to sleep on. I have neck, back and shoulder issues and the next morning after my first use, I was in so much less pain. I did have to take a little stuffing out in order to be properly aligned. I'm a side sleeper and sometimes back. I followed the directions as followed after first receiving it and had not issues with any odor. The pillow was also nicely packaged. I also want to mention that the Amazon delivery person took special care of my package while delivering. She put it in a place where it was well hidden.
customer_reviews.author: debb d

customer_reviews.title: A good night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: A great pillow as you can personalize it to your sleep position...and the amount of fluff that you like. Also the bamboo material for the cover means you sleep cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: OPA Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not a cooling pillow
customer_reviews.text: Well the pillow is awesome ! adjustable to the support needed ,soft comfortable very nice . However there isn't anything cooling about this pillow . In fact it will burn your ass up ! If your a hot sleeper it just got hotter ,even with the cooling type pillow cases like the Eucalyptus sheets still burn your ass up.
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, supportive, and soft
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many failed pillows searching for support and comfort and this pillow is the winner and keeper. I sleep on my back, side, and stomach and I can get very warm at night. I sleep better because I'm able to adjust the pillow by maneuvering the fill very quickly to add or reduce support. Somewhat like adjusting a feather pillow, but, this pillow retains its position. I did not need to add or subtract any of the fill and have been using it as delivered. However, I like the additional fill in case I need it. Best pillow I've owned and am ordering another as my spouse tried it out and now wants one too.
customer_reviews.author: body worker

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in the amount of foam that comes in this ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the amount of foam that comes in this pillow. For the price it should come full and you can take some out as needed. Not half empty and you are required to buy additional foam for $20/bag. If it had enough foam, it probably would feel like a comfortable pillow, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: ZE

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over a month now, and I think it's a great pillow! I prefer a flatter pillow, so it's nice that you can customize the thickness of this by adding or removing the foam bits. It very comfortable, and does stay cooler than a typical cotton fill pillow. It does require fluffing by the end of each week, but that's simple, either toss it in the dryer for 10 minutes, or just shake the foam bits loose by grabbing each corner and shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Pete - Ohio

customer_reviews.title: This pillow requires work. A different night of sleep...every night.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Coop pillow for several months now. This has become my slogan for my Coop pillow. ‘This pillow requires work. A different night of sleep...every night.‘ Even though I adjust it every night, the sleep experience is always different. Sometimes it’s like a cloud with great side-sleeping support, others times I had headaches because the pillow was ‘off’ in a certain way. For users that have this problem, I’ve always had more consistent sleep with solid memory foam pillows. I sleep on my side mostly. The Coop pillow might be 5 stars for some people, but not for me. I was expecting more consistent sleep considering the cost of this pillow. But the pillow does feel good.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Inside has very little memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these pillows and the inside was nothing like the pictures. Mine had probably 5% memory foam and 95% cheap filler - it was NOTHING like the pictures. The "cooling gel" they're talking about was, I suppose, the tiny blue dots inside the memory foam. What a joke. To say that would somehow have an effect on the pillow's temparature is absurd. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: T.H.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical odor too strong, but otherwise top quality
customer_reviews.text: Dislikes: Sickening chemical odor. I was instructed to place pillow in dryer w/ dryer sheets. I did so for over an hour. Better, but faint, foul odor still there. I unzipped the side and let it air out for over a week. Odor still faintly there. Tried to sleep with it, but couldn't. Sickening smell. Odor indicates foam has not finished chemical curing process. Seems manufacturer is skipping a drying step before shipping product. My Casper foam pillow was completely odorless, but made in China, so I don't trust it. Likes: Made in USA. Came with extra foam to customize your fill level. Excellent idea. Very comfortable pillow and seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head. And it gets hot very easily. I've always been a pillow turning--flipping my pillow to get to the cool side every little while. I would also alternate between using one or two pillows to help with my back and neck problems. This pillow has been a game changer. I don't flip it--it stays cool throughout the night. And I don't need additional support. It's perfect. This pillow is slightly softer than a solid memory foam pillow, but much more supportive than a tradition pillow. It's perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a hug!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pillow; it hugs my back and neck. It does get a little hot sometimes but, not near as bad as my previous memory foam pillow. It’s been a big help for my neck... after removing some of the foam. My only complaint would be that these do not fit properly in a standard or king pillow case (which are 20” wide) When you force it into one, you lose the ability to adjust the pillow properly.
customer_reviews.author: PaleDaffodil

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillow! I have spent many $ on tried and failed pillows over the last 10 years. My collection is frustrating but I have finally found THE pillow! I now look forward to going to bed rather than the daunting feeling of tossing,turning, fluffing throughout the night. I have chronic neck pain and I no longer wake with stiff neck and more pain than when I went to bed. Fellow pillow searchers out there, your search is over with this pillow!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: It takes the best of down and memory foam. What I don't like about down is that it's not supportive enough. What I don't like about memory foam is that it's not very adjustable. This pillow avoids both of those problems. I'm primarily a back sleeper but always shift to both sides for a portion of the night. Once in a while, I go stomach. I an easily "fluff" this pillow for a perfect fit no matter what position I'm lying. People complaining about the plastic order must have very sensitive noses. Once I ran it through the dryer, as recommended, I don't notice it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Price

customer_reviews.title: I have finally found a pillow I love!!
customer_reviews.text: It feels like I’ve been searching for a pillow that doesn’t leave me with a sore neck every morning for more years than I can remember. This pillow is so great. It comes with tons of extra filling and gives you easy directions on how to fluff it before using and remove/add stuffing to customize it to your needs. It doesn’t have any sort of weird smell and is so soft and comfy. I’m a side/back sleeper so I ended up taking out a little of the stuffing. I’ve had it for about 2 weeks and so far I LOVE it! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: JRubbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my neck, probably from a lot of desk time and a bad sitting pose. Often time I had to wake up from severe neck pain. I would try a low pillow, which turns out to be too low, and a high pillow, which turns out to be too high. The best part about this pillow is that you get to adjust the height in a way that fits your neck perfectly. I don't know what they do with the stuff inside, but I can only say that it works perfectly and lets me have a deep sleep I craved for. I had no issue with my neck ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Jury’s still out on this one...
customer_reviews.text: Generally, I like the pillow. Easy to adjust fill to suit your preferences... but if you’re expecting this pillow to remain cool all night then keep looking. It is cooler than my other poly foam filled pillows, but it still warms up over time. Maybe my expectations were to high, but I’m a bit disappointed. Not enough to send it back, but for the money it’s not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Eternal Reader

customer_reviews.title: The answer to my 15 year neck problems!
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow after a Sports Trainer friend let me borrow hers for a few days! I instantly ordered one for me and my daughter. I have had cronic neck problems for 25 years. With 5 bulging discs and muscle tension, I wake every morning with a massive headache. The Coop pillow (Eden) is perfect for me! You can adjust how you want to sleep, as it comes with extra filling. I am in love!!! Thank you, The Coop
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER P. VANZANDT

customer_reviews.title: VERY FIRM! UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue what these other reviewers are going on about because this pillow is VERY firm and VERY uncomfortable! It is absolutely NOT down like. It is absolutely NOT soft. This is a VERY FIRM pillow. I've adjusted it every night since purchasing it and it is just an overpriced sandbag. I don't get why it has such great reviews. Am I the ONLY person who HATES firm pillows? Waste of money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid Lady

customer_reviews.title: Did not have a cooling affect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pillows. One for my husband and one form myself. It was a high maintenance pillow. The smell was bad. Followed all the manufactures instructions to get rid of the smell. Didn’t work. Washed the pillow cases separately from the pillow. Took 2 1/2 days to have it completely dried. The foam inside just would not dry. Totally. I don’t think it has a cooling factor. Which is the most important thing to me. My husband says the pillow works for him after we got rid of the smell. That’s why I only returned one. I think it has good support, but the quilted cover left lines on my face because of the raised pattern on the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but Cooling?  Not Much!
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to receive our new pillows, especially considering the price (we had high expectations). This pillow is very comfortable. We like that you can remove or add stuffing based on your preference. However, our main reason for purchasing this pillow was for its cooling feature. It cools for about three seconds, almost like any other pillow. The cooling feature sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock and didn't soften with time
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly fussy when it comes to pillows. This one cost twice what I've paid for anything previously, but I was hoping it would finally resolve my sleeping problem - I spend all night trying to align my pillow in a way that I can breathe, it doesn't put pressure on my ear, my head is the right height, etc. This one was supposed to be comfortable - semi-soft, ideal for side sleepers. WRONG. It reminds me of the foam slabs we used to have as children because we were allergic to feather pillows when there were no other options. I will continue searching.
customer_reviews.author: lidlone

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised with the comfort and cooling of this pillow. Consistent comfort. I used to get horribly hot and sweat at night, waking up to a gross pillow. This pillow has kept my pre-menopausal overheating at bay. I wake up dry, no more neck or shoulder pain. I'm a stomach sleeper and this has been the perfect pillow for comfort. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I was soooooo excited to get this pillow especially after reading that it was hypoallergenic. I ended up taking some of the foam out right before I went to bed. In the middle of the night my hands were itching so bad it woke me up. Then by the next morning my face, neck, and upper shoulder were badly itching. I contacted the company only to find out that the insides are NOT hypoallergenic but they are made with polyester and polyurethane. Immediately returning the pillow after doing some google research on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bland

customer_reviews.title: Has great potential.
customer_reviews.text: Have neck problems so bought this pillow based on reviews. I have only used it for 2 weeks. I have adjusted foam 4 times. Added then remove etc. so I still may not have density correct. The pillow is soft and comfortable. I like that you can adjust. I just don’t know if a pillow can solve my neck issues. I am going to keep at it since I have tried MANY pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This pillow supports and cradles the head and ensures a heat resistance  temperature.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pillow for neck support. I use to wake up with a sore sagging neck. Now, laying on a pillow made with products that will support and cradle your head night after night, I have virtually no pain. The company also provides customers with extra foam and gel to ensure the best support. I bought special pillowcases that wicks the heat away from the head ensuring temperature comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Romanchik

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow after having chronic neck pain and seeking relief without having to pay some snake oil chiropractor to "adjust" my spine 3x a week. I read online and watched some youtube videos from some trainers and physical therapists, and seeing multiple people mention sleep position being so important. One mentioned this pillow specifically due to its adjustable nature. I ordered it, adjusted it so that my neck was straighter when I went to bed, and seriously 2 mornings later I barely had any neck pain. Its been a few months, and my neck pain is completely gone. Definitely recommend checking this one out.
customer_reviews.author: H_Farris

customer_reviews.title: Diminishes with time
customer_reviews.text: I was having neck and back issues while sleeping and tried several pillows before this one. My first few nights, I was so impressed and relieved to finally find a pillow that was soft yet supportive and not lumpy. However, after a few months' use, it has gone a bit flat and is less comfortable now. Still better than many of the options I've tried, but not a holy grail pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea E.

customer_reviews.title: The Chemical smell is so strong must air out and wash before use
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say that we bought this pillow because the claimed they were Low or 0 voc but the chemical smell to me was so strong. Even after we aired it out and washed it. It was better but still had a crazy strong chemical, plastic smell.It made my nose run, and burned my eyes and woke me up several times because of it. I most likely plan on returning this pillow. I will say that the pillow was comfortable and very soft and adjustable, so if not for the smell it would probably be a very good pillow. After washing a couple of times and pulling out all the stuffing inside and airing out it did get better.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: I have found this pillow product to be quite effective versus other pillows I have used in the past. Initially, the packaged pillow as delivered was too bulky for my personal needs. Being able to reduce the memory foam within the casing allowed me to tailor my pillow to my needs. I have used this pillow for several months now and have no complaints. It's supports my neck while remaining temperature neutral. When the product was delivered and I opened it there was a definite toxic smelling odor. This odor went away after airing out for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Breview

customer_reviews.title: Great support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Probably the hardest most comfortable pillow I have ever used--initial use. I'm comfortable and cooler than my previous pillow. It's definitely firm. I left the extra foam out and fluffed the pillow in a cool clothes dryer per instructions. If you are a heavy head, like me, this is your pillow. I'm happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Incredible comfort
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research, I purchased two of these pillows. They arrived in a moderately small box and when I removed them I immediately thought “you got to be kidding me”. After reading the instructions, I put both pillows in the dryer on low heat for 10 minutes. Biggest pillows I’ve ever had. We actually had to remove 4 to 5 handfuls of stuffing out of the pillows. Additionally, the pillows come with even more stuffing! With the included extra stuffing in addition to the filling we removed, we could actually make a third pillow. Oh, and by the way, these are the most comfortable pillows we’ve ever purchased. Comfy and cooling. Seriously buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have another similar pillow that is a literal pain in the neck as it's just way too full. It is extremely uncomfortable as a person who sleeps on my side, back and stomach at different times throughout the night. I was looking for something that would be supportive in all sleeping positions. Found this pillow and decided to give it a try since it's adjustable. It is AMAZINGLY Comfortable! I ended up purchasing another for my fiance shortly after receiving mine and he loves his too. They're comfortable, stay cool and no more neck pain even I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found the best pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can adjust this pillow and take the stuffing out or add it back in to get it to the optimal level. It took a few adjustments over the first two weeks but I found the right level for me and am sleep better than ever. I’ve even noticed that I haven’t been over heating during the night. So worth the investment. Highly recommend this to anyone looking for better sleep.
customer_reviews.author: CShopper

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a pillow that will make you fall asleep and stay asleep look no further! Im a pillow finatic always trying to find the best pillow because if you have a bad one you dont sleep well....well i found it! I bought the queen last week and a king this week. I will say if you put it in the dryer it expands so if its perfect no need to put it in the dryer. The queen pillow I put in the dryer and had to take out some foam. The king I left as is. The pillow cradles your head perfectly. You wont regret this pillow purchase! 👍🏻👍🏻🥰
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pillow for a few months and it is still the best one I have ever had. I will never use a different brand other than this one. I get neck pain from most pillows because after a week or 2 they go flat. This one, forms to me and is so soft yet firm at the same time. No matter what pillow type you prefer, this one is for you. I will be buying more of these. If you are worried about the price, I will tell you, it is worth it. Your sleep will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: You must purchase this pillow! I’ve spent hundreds if not thousands of dollars in search of comfortable pillow and I finally found it! However, I did not receive the extra filling that I received when I purchased my first Coop pillow. I’ve heard customer is excellent so I just need to call. Do not hesitate to purchase as I will NEVER buy another pillow other than Coop. Holds it shape and has improved my sleep tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: MLM1

customer_reviews.title: Beats "My Pillow"
customer_reviews.text: I got this after the "my pillow" product kept compacting too much and losing support properties. I also don't like the fiberfill, memory foam or feather pillows, having tried all of them over my lifetime and still having a couple in my closet. So far, it's holding up well, fluffs in the dryer and does the job better for me. It still gets the "dent", like they all will but a quick punching and it's up to snuff again. I'll update if needed as I use it. I don't think any of these pillows will last indefinitely but I expect to get at least a solid year out of one.
customer_reviews.author: Azbard

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for eight months and it’s hard and flat now. I have enough extra foam to refill it two more times but I haven’t wanted to face the hassle yet. It was great for about five months. I expected the foam to wear down though just like a memory foam mattress does. I suggest taking out as much foam as possible when you get it. It’s very overstuffed plus they send extra. The zip pillowcase is good but I don’t use the second case because it makes it too tight to mold the shape I need
customer_reviews.author: AmazingSupergirl

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Reports was correct
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Reports recommended the Co-op Home Goods pillows, and I was delighted. I'm a side-sleeper with low-back problems and sleep with CPAP (nasal pillow type). I also ordered this company's body pillow and was equally pleased with it. Very substantial pillows which help me sleep without a drooping neck/head. The manufacturer's recommendation to run these through dryer on low heat worked well to expand the filling. Also the manufacturer warned that there would be some initial smell was correct and that dissipated in one day. The recommendation to lay them in the sunlight was beyond my capability in NW Washington's winter weather, but the pillows are doing fine.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping  through the night!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow because another reviewer mentioned that he did not have to flip the pillow over and over during the night to maintain coolness. He was right. The last 2 nights I slept straight thru, my head is no longer “hot” and for this alone I must recommend this pillow. I have had this problem for years causing interrupted sleep. I also like that it came with a bag that had extra filling and you can add and subtract filling. You really don’t have to throw it in the dryer as recommended; you can just fluff it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I may never find perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality pillow. However, it wasn't the orgasmic, life-changing experience I had hoped for. It was packaged nicely, and I followed the dryer fluffing instructions...maybe even over fluffed because of what some said about the smell. I didn't find smell to be a problem. The pillow comes with a small bag of extra foam and I added it right away. I have no complaints about materials or packaging or zipper case. It's just not the ultimate pillow for me. I probably could have been equally happy and satisfied with a less expensive pillow.
customer_reviews.author: R Harris

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my pillow I had been using for 6 years after having frequent neck pain and reduced quality of sleep. I also had some mattress issues, but just changing this made a world of difference in terms of sleep and comfort. The first night I used it and every night since I've had some of the deepest and most restful sleep ever. I was skeptical when I received the pillow as it felt like a less-pokey down pillow, but now I know it was definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever for any type of sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: Best pillow I've ever owned, and I've tried many different kinds. I primarily sleep on my back and sometimes on my side and this pillow is AMAZING for both. I also sleep hot and this pillow stays cool! I needed to remove about 20-25% of the stuffing and now it's perfect for my head/neck. Worth every penny! I just bought another for my wife who loved this pillow when she tried it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft but firm pillow that is good for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Comfy pillow. It comes with a bunch if extra stuffing so you can tailor the pillow. I ended up stuffing too much so I am titrating it out until I hit the magic spot. It has a washable cover which is very nice. Expensive but worth it if you need a bit of help sleeping well when you stop and think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyr Na Nog

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great adjustability and wonderfully supportive pillow. So good I already bought a second one. My only issue is I haven't experienced any cooling effect and since I suffer from night sweats this would have been nice. I use a pillow case with it so maybe that negates the cooling, don't know, but I do highly recommend the pillow. I have gotten rid of the My Pillows as these are superior. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: S. Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Five stars isn't enough
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is basically the best thing that's ever happened to me. I am so hard to please when it comes to pillows — one day I crave a fuller fill, the next I want it thin and floppy. It's exhausting. This lil' guy though... The fact that you can take out and add in the filling at will is a freakin' treat. I've settled on the perfect fill for my every mood and now have enough leftover 'stuffing' that I've gone to the Coop site and bought another of the pillow cases, and when it arrives I'll make another pillow out of it. Boom. A billion stars. Highly recommended. Run don't walk. Make it yours today.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Archer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pillow regardless of sleep position
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used to use two pillows stacked up to get the proper height. These pillows were great right out of the box (well, after a 10 minute fluff in the dryer). They come with extra stuffing but we decided to try them as is at first. They are thick and supportive and we have been sleeping very soundly. I am a back and side sleeper and my wife sleeps like the dead but rolls around throughout the night. The pillow has worked great for both of us. We are going to hold onto the extra stuffing in case there is compaction over time. I can see why Consumer Reports picked this as the top pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Guy W. Hager

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Support
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for several months before writing this review. Have been searching for a good pillow for years. With necks issues this is the first pillow that has helped, after many other purchases that just didn’t work for me. The Coop is supportive without being hard. You can mold it to your needs and it will stay where you want it. It’s large enough to support even your shoulders if necessary. Comes with extra filler, to fluff up if you need immediately or later. There is instructions inside when you receive your pillow as well. No worries.
customer_reviews.author: whitemouse

customer_reviews.title: Finally the pillow I have been searching for
customer_reviews.text: I can’t begin to tell you how many pillows I have bought for my neck/shoulder pain. I have researched and finally found this pillow and I am finally happy!!! Look no further if you have been struggling. You can take out the shredded memory foam until you have reached your desired comfort level. They send you an extra bag of it in case you want to add more! What more can you ask for? I have told my chiropractor to tell his patients about this because I feel like it has been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Super Coop!
customer_reviews.text: I have never spent this much on a pillow before, but it's worth every cent! I've tried so many pillows to help with my neck pain and this one is the winner! I followed the instructions and put the pillow in the dryer on low for 10-15 minutes, I slept on it that night, no odors from the fill or any issues at all. I did end up taking a handful of fill out of the pillow and it's just perfect for me. I would order this pillow again and again...I love it!
customer_reviews.author: mlb

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows. I’ve replaced my down pillows with these for several reason. Comfort by aligning the spine and they can be adjusted by removing or adding fill, which is included w your purchase. Durability, they can be Machine washed. My son tells me they’re much better than the My Pillow products endlessly advertised on tv. All that said, my pillows are all relatively new... can’t say, from experience they’ll last for years. So far though, I can say they’re a good pillow. Have recommended to several friends who love them as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Okay, WOW. This is a great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Support is excellent, and you can pull stuffing out, or add extra stuffing (provided in the box the pillow comes in) to achieve the perfect loft. Most important to me is that the pillow does not feel lumpy at all. It feels like a "normal" pillow (smooth), while still providing enough support and is moldable to fit my shoulders and neck.
customer_reviews.author: SA Bick

customer_reviews.title: Supportive luxury!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the Eden pillow! I’ve only used it one night but so far so good! It may take a few days to adjust to using a different pillow after being used to solid foam types but this is really comfortable. It has some cushy loft but feels very supportive on my problematic neck and love that I can adjust the foam any way I want. I added a little bit of foam to make it slightly firmer but glad I got the Eden rather than the Original because this one feels luxurious! It has a slight odor but no different than other foam pillows I have owned over the years. I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: chn0730

customer_reviews.title: Supportative and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've tried various pillows over time with mixed results. I've used "MyPillow" for the last few years (OK pillow), but find I'm constantly fluffing the pillow up, even after using the drier. I've been using this Coop pillow for awhile. It works for me better than "my pillow" - supporting my head and neck well, especially with its reinforced edge. I did not need to add or remove more filling, but like that additional filling was included and I have that option if ever needed. The pillow itself is cool and very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Capps

customer_reviews.title: 2 for the price of 1
customer_reviews.text: Coop pillow came packaged with the additional bag of filling. The instructions came in the box, no need to watch a video online. It took a few nights to get the filling where I needed it. With the filling I removed and the extra that came with the pillow I have enough for another pillow !
customer_reviews.author: cnesh

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble sleeping due to health issues. I've always had problems finding a compatible pillow until now. I hesitated because of the price but bought one knowing I could return it for a refund if it did not work out. This pillow is remarkable. It's soft, comfortable and adjustable. Since I sleep on my side I removed about 1/4 of the stuffing and this made the pillow the perfect height for me. I am sleeping better now.
customer_reviews.author: LDM

customer_reviews.title: Not identical twins!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these pillows that arrived today and right away I knew something was wrong. When I inspected both pillows I noticed they both felt different. I opened them up to check the material inside. One of the pillows foam feels nice, fresh, solid and responsive, all throughout the pillow, the other one felt and looked cheap like a bunch of cotton. Hope the picture can shed light on what I'm talking about. 2 star for now because the good pillow is actually great.
customer_reviews.author: GEExFLiPPiN

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, then bought another one, then 2 more...... because if I like it then everyone in the family and friends circle must have one. This is the most comfortable pillow, and I sleep all night without waking up, which is not normal.....but now it is. Being able to adjust the loft is a plus, although for mine, its best as is. We are all different sleeper types.....stomach & side sleeper, back sleeper, side and back sleeper, and so far these pillows have adjusted to all.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is what dreams are made of
customer_reviews.text: I've been using "MyPillow" for the last 10 years and thought I needed a change so I searched 'best pillow" and this one came up. I watched the video, read the reviews, pondered it a few days (yes, I am picky about my pillows) and I bought it. THIS IS THE BEST PILLOW I HAVE EVER OWNED. Comfortable and does not go flat at all. I love it! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C. Kleinhans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for our anniversary and he loves it!!! He doesn’t snore anymore and sleeps the entire night. He prefers to use all the stuffing. It’s perfect for him and he’s absolutely happy with the pillow. I think it’s really cool that they provide extra stuffing for buildable comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Lorlee

customer_reviews.title: Perfection Finally
customer_reviews.text: For some people... the search for the perfect pillow is an ongoing lifetime project. My efforts may have ended right here, with the Eden pillow. I’m guessing I’m into pillows for thousands of dollars by now... after decades of searching. This pillow approaches perfection on many levels, comfort being the first. It’s quiet, cool, moldable, fluffy and adjustable. Everyone has their own personal requirements for comfortable bedding, so it’s tricky business getting it all right. But... get a bad pillow and a bad nights sleep, and nothing else matters. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Desertdog

customer_reviews.title: Might be the best pillow I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: After a recent open-heart surgery I was finding myself getting too warm at night especially at my head. I've had the same pillows for years and did a quick internet search on the best "cool" pillows out there. After reading through all the reviews I decided to order the Eden pillow. What a difference!!! I'm able to fall asleep more easily on my side and my head remains cool throughout the night. The pillow is so comfy my fiance made me order her one immediately after mine arrived. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Night's Sleep, Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Like everything so far, dislike nothing so far. The pillow came in it's own box, shrink wrapped, along with another bag of extra filling. Once I opened the pillow bag, there was a slight off-gas smell, but nothing major, so put it into the dryer for 10-15 minutes to fluff. Boy! Did it ever fluff. At first I thought it would be too thick but once I settled on it, I was out like a light. Hubby even said he didn't hear me snore at all. My pillow, finally! Love it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what the hype is about
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was truly awful. I bought it because of the abundance of good online reviews. It was not comfortable no matter how much fluff I added or took out. As is it’s too high for your neck and head. As you take the fluff out your head sinks as it separates and goes to the sides. Would not recommend this pillow. Go to bed bath and beyond and get a decent standard pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Lofty and firm but really plush
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pillows. I received the king sized and they are lofty and supportive, but plush. They come with an extra 1/2 pound of fill, but I can’t imagine it being needed unless they lose some loft over time. No odor was present right out of the box. They do sleep cool so far, I haven’t had any issues with heat retention. Best I’ve ever owned by far.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Out There, IMO
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is adjustable. I have tried a few other pillows. My pillow is a waste of money, IMO and we had the Xtreme Comforts pillows before that. They are too firm for me. From the first night I used this I have slept more soundly than I have in years. Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Isakoff

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as a replacement for Tempurpedic Neck Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a neck pillow for almost 15 years and Tempurpedic no longer makes the king neck pillow, so have been looking for an optional replacement. Tried the Coop...it is comfortable, and under any other circumstances would be a great pillow, but it just does not allow for the contour my neck needs for the perfect support that a neck pillow provides. I would recommend though as a great pillow option.
customer_reviews.author: CJ M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. I choose this one over the standard one although I am a side sleeper and the standard one was recommended on their website. My neck was hurting with my old down pillow, so I got a new pillow vs. going to a chiropractor. This pillow did the trick. I’ve had it for about 10 months. I’m sure there’s other good pillows but you will love this one. It comes overfilled so after two adjustments it is perfect. Thanks coop!
customer_reviews.author: Portly

customer_reviews.title: Just no
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has many positive review, so I decided to give it a try. The main problem I have with this pillow it’s that it gets so hot, probably cause of the memory foam and the shredded memory foam just wasn't for me. Everyone’s different so maybe you’ll like the feeling of this pillow, but it still doesn't change the fact that this pillow gets hot rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gaming Asesino

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Neutral;
customer_reviews.text: May be okay for some people, but not for me. Turns out you have to adjust stuffing in and out depending on how you want to lay in bed. It comes filled for side sleepers, but if you don't stay that way all night it is to thick/firm to lay on your back or stomach. Never had that problem with fiber filled pillows. Rolling it up and putting it back in the bag it came in is a struggle. Also has an odor about it, and was kind of too warm to sleep on. I put it in the dryer for 10mins to fluff it up. So much for foam pillows. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: skullduggery

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my new pillow
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I was going to find a pillow that I liked, I’m super picky. I’m a hot sleeper and fussy about how my pillow feels, so when I used this I was very pleased with its performance. I sleep a lot cooler (not perfect) but it’s way better than a regular pillow. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Taylor

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else, I was afraid to spend this much on a pillow, but I needed a new one. After trying a friend's I decided to bite the bullet. I accidentally ordered a king and at first was disappointed, but after I took out all the extra stuffing in the pillow that I didn't need, and added the extra fluff that comes separately with each pillow, I had enough to put in a zippered pillow cover I already owned and make another pillow for my husband. I now love my pillow, and he loves his! So glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Two years later still the best pillow I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: After using basic pillows all our lives, and having to find various combinations of types to get a decent night's sleep my wife and I decided to finally invest in finding something better. After trying various funky shaped styles at stores and some reading we settled on buying these and couldn't be happier. Two years later they remain unbelievably comfortable every single night and we haven't had to use a second pillow for any reason since getting these. If you want long lasting comfort and support, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable for you
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillow. I am either a back or side sleeper. Because I am small in stature, I have a really hard time finding a pillow that is both firm enough and does not cause neck pain. The ability to remove and add the filling is a fantastic feature. I do usually have to "fluff" it up in the dryer once every week to week and a half to keep it where it works for me, but that is fine. I love it so much, that I got one for my husband, too.
customer_reviews.author: pagme

product_meta.title: Coop Home Goods - Eden Adjustable Pillow - Hypoallergenic Shredded Memory Foam with Cooling Gel - Lulltra Washable Cover from Bamboo Derived Rayon - CertiPUR-US/GREENGUARD Gold Certified - Standard
feature_bullets: LOOK NO FURTHER, HOT SLEEPERS - Your search for the perfect adjustable pillow has come to an end. The Eden features our soft, gel-infused memory foam & microfiber fill blend for a cooler sleep experience and a gusseted design for edge-to-edge support.

FULLY ADJUSTABLE, YOU ARE IN CONTROL – Experiencing pain, snoring or tossing and turning are all signs of sleeping wrong. Our unique adjustable design allows you to access the memory foam fill, which you can add or remove to suit your size, shape or sleep position. SLEEP RIGHT!

IS YOUR PILLOW GREEN GUARD GOLD CERTIFIED? – Our Coop Home Goods Eden Pillows undergo strict, third-party lab testing and are CertiPUR-US and GREENGUARD Gold certified to ensure safety and quality. No toxic or harmful chemicals here! IT`S 100% SAFE FOR YOU AND YOUR LOVED ONES. Vegan & Cruelty Free – no animals were harmed in the making of this awesome pillow.

WE CARE – ONLY THE HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS USED! - The case is made with proprietary Lulltra fabric, a blend of bamboo-derived viscose rayon and polyester that provides breathability and softness. Hypoallergenic & dust mite resistant, you can finally wake up refreshed. Unlike other pillows – we freshly manufacture our foam instead of using repurposed materials. A bonus ½ lb bag of fill is included with your order if you need a higher loft.

YOUR BEST SLEEP EVER, GUARANTEED - You can now purchase with confidence. If you don’t fall in love within 100 nights (although we’re sure you will), contact us directly to return the pillow for a full refund, no questions asked. Each Coop Home Goods Eden Pillow also comes with a 5-year warranty. MADE IN USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,440 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 100 night trial 5 year warranty against defects
